recipesJson.name: Cheesy Blue The Double Trilogy
recipesJson.author: Dank1
recipesJson.description: This blueberry Cheesecake was made on/for Interactive Mixing on the Diydownunder network. The blueberry trilogy Im not sure who to credit. The Cheesecake trilogy was created by Mr. Alfred Pudding

reviews.text: I'm getting really good blueberry and cheesecake out it.  I need to try it in other atomizers to see how it works, but in Asgard Mini it's the bomb.
This is a SUCCESS - I get two solid layers out of this mix, its been balanced out nicely. These are two of my favorite things together - of course i'm going to love it.
